message: This is a surprisingly in-depth article on different techniques for scraping the contents of HTML documents and preserving the overall page layout and structure (header, sidebars, main content, footers, etc..). Definitely worth a read for the discussion on algorithms and also Boilerplate library recommendation.
thank you, this blog article actually offers a good overview over different techniques for "content classification" to extract the actual content/article from an HTML source code.
